body_html:
@goldsborough @Kaixhin We have a few more issues:

  • AutoGPU is compiled with WITH_CUDA. Instead, it should be in an auto_gpu.cpp file so we do not have to set this macro while compiling it...
  • @ezyang says when you're on device 1 and try to do operations that's valid with device 0 tensors, it will fail. I think the expected behavior is to do the operation and put the result tensor on device 0?
  • Also, a small nit is that there's no toDevice in ATen.
body:
@goldsborough @Kaixhin We have a few more issues:

- [ ] AutoGPU is compiled with WITH_CUDA. Instead, it should be in an auto_gpu.cpp file so we do not have to set this macro while compiling it...
- [ ] @ezyang says when you're on device 1 and try to do operations that's valid with device 0 tensors, it will fail. I think the expected behavior is to do the operation and put the result tensor on device 0?
- [ ] Also, a small nit is that there's no toDevice in ATen.
